    • Method Detail

      • psuAuthentication

        @PostMapping(path="/{consentSessionState}/psuAuth")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ConsentAuthorizeResponse> psuAuthentication(@PathVariable(value="consentSessionState")
                                                                                                                                        String consentSessionState,
                                                                                                                                        @RequestHeader(name="Cookie",required=false)
                                                                                                                                        String consentCookieString,
                                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                        PsuAuthDataTO authData)
        Identifies the user by login an pin.

        The returned object contains:

        • A list of accounts

          This is supposed to be used to display the list of accounts to the psu

        • An AisConsent object

          This consent is initialized, but might not contain any more information

        Parameters:
        consentSessionState - The consent session state
        consentCookieString - The consent cookie
        authData - auth data
        Returns:
        ConsentAuthorizeResponse

      • startConsentAuth

        @PostMapping(value="/{consentSessionState}/startAuth")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ConsentAuthorizeResponse> startConsentAuth(@PathVariable(value="consentSessionState")
                                                                                                                                          String consentSessionState,
                                                                                                                                          @RequestHeader(name="Cookie",required=false)
                                                                                                                                          String consentCookieString,
                                                                                                                                          @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                          AisConsentTO aisConsent)
        Starts the consent authorization process after PSU selects which account to grant access to.
        Parameters:
        consentSessionState - The consent session state
        consentCookieString - The consent cookie
        aisConsent - the consent request object
        Returns:
        ConsentAuthorizeResponse

      • scaAuthMethod

        @PostMapping(value="/{consentSessionState}/scaAuthMethod")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ConsentAuthorizeResponse> scaAuthMethod(@PathVariable(value="consentSessionState")

        Selects the SCA Method for use.

        @PostMapping(path="/{consentSessionState}/scaAuthData")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ConsentAuthorizeResponse> authrizedConsent(@PathVariable(value="consentSessionState")

      • revokeConsent

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{consentSessionState}")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ConsentAuthorizeResponse> revokeConsent(@PathVariable(value="consentSessionState")
                                                                                                                              String consentSessionState,
                                                                                                                              @RequestHeader(name="Cookie",required=false)
                                                                                                                              String consentCookieString,
                                                                                                                              @RequestBody
                                                                                                                              PsuScaDoneDataTO scaDoneData)
                                                                                                                       throws ConsentAuthorizeException
        Revokes the consent and closes the session. Eventually redirect PSU back to the TPP.
        Parameters:
        consentSessionState - The consent session state
        consentCookieString - The consent cookie
        scaDoneData - Redirection preferences of the user agent.
        Returns:
        ConsentAuthorizeResponse
        Throws:
        ConsentAuthorizeException

      • scaDone

        @GetMapping(path="/{consentSessionState}/scaDone")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ConsentAuthorizeResponse> scaDone(@PathVariable(value="consentSessionState")
                                                                                                                             String consentSessionState,
                                                                                                                             @RequestHeader(name="Cookie",required=false)
                                                                                                                             String consentCookieString,
                                                                                                                             @RequestBody
                                                                                                                             PsuScaDoneDataTO scaDoneData)
                                                                                                                      throws ConsentAuthorizeException
        This call provides the server with the opportunity to close this session and redirect the PSU to the TPP or close the application window.

        In any case, the session of the user will be closed and cookies will be deleted.

        Parameters:
        consentSessionState - The consent session state
        consentCookieString - The consent cookie
        scaDoneData - Redirection preferences of the user agent.
        Returns:
        ConsentAuthorizeResponse
        Throws:
        ConsentAuthorizeException
